title: Unfair banned.
body: Got a 14-day suspension for being negative. Any way I can dispute this?

replies.body:
Honestly though, I'm surprised you only got 14 days suspension from that game. I think I have to go and wash my eyes now.
Have you received the reformed card?
We'd love to chat about it if you want to help you realize why it is not acceptable using that kind of language (anywhere, not just in game).

Yeah in hindsight I can  see the fault on my part. Not too proud of the chatlogs tbh. Not sure if you can see the entire game chatlog or just mine but if you were told to repeatedly drink bleach and kill yourself for no apparent reason you'd kinda understand where my retaliation came from. The reason why I think is unjust because in all these instances I was simply retaliating to what someone else said. Never have I instigated an argument  if you can see from my logs.

I did read all the chat log and yes, you may have not started but what would have happened if you were the bigger man and ignored / muted him?
You would have not escalated it and he would have have likely stopped provoking you. 
He would have gotten his ban anyway and you wouldn't.

Yeah that obv would've been the case but it's easy to look at it in third person and say "just ignore it". But when someone is hurling such hateful comments it's hard to ignore. What would have happened if he didn't say anything in the first place and not be toxic? Nothing, everyone would have went about the game and no one would be banned.

> [{quoted}](name=DJDilly,realm=OCE,application-id=T8eq2lFQ,discussion-id=Xa13LBlc,comment-id=0003000100000000,timestamp=2016-05-27T05:48:05.578+0000)
>
> Yeah that obv would've been the case but it's easy to look at it in third person and say "just ignore it". But when someone is hurling such hateful comments it's hard to ignore.

That's why there's a mute feature, so you don't even have to see what someone else is typing if they start being toxic.

Fact is, you responded in the wrong manner. They may have been in the wrong but that has nothing to do with the choices *you* make and the way *you* choose to respond.

Well, I must admit this makes me interested about what was said.

http://i.imgur.com/fXCUz27.jpg

> [{quoted}](name=HeartVine,realm=OCE,application-id=T8eq2lFQ,discussion-id=Xa13LBlc,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2016-05-26T01:30:06.649+0000)
>
> Well, I must admit this makes me interested about what was said.
> 


I don't want to upload it here since the chatlog only shows what I said which makes its completely out of context. If you're still curious I can send you the logs in PM.
Context doesn't really matter if you were being toxic. "He/She started it" is nothing more than a "3-year-olds" excuse and has no place in disputing punishments for toxic behaviour in-game.
You should have received a few chat logs to show why you were banned. If you want, you can post them here and we can have a discussion around the suspension.

If you have been banned for 14days on the League of Legends homescreen (where the shop button, hextech button etc are.) It will say a few chat logs and other information. Can you perhaps copy and paste what was listed in the logs? Or perhaps take a picture using Gyazo.
Contact [support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us). They'll review the case and determine if the punishment was deserved.
